briefTitle: Study of Bathing With Chlorhexidine Impregnated Cloths on Nosocomial Infections in the Pediatric Intensive Care Unit

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients in pediatric intensive care unit

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with a history of an allergic reaction to chlorhexidine
* Patients less than 2 months of age
* Patients with severe skin disease or burn
* Patients with an indwelling epidural catheter or lumbar drain

outcomeMeasures.title: Bacteremia
outcomeMeasures.description: incidence of bacteremia comparing those in treatment and control groups

outcomeMeasures.title: Central Line Associated-bloodstream Infection (CLABSI)
outcomeMeasures.description: Comparing incidence of central line-associated bloodstream infections between treatment and control groups
